expo.name: Indigo Habits

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Indigo Habits needs access to your photos to add images to your journal entries.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Indigo Habits needs access to your camera to take photos for your journal entries.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Indigo Habits needs access to your microphone to record audio notes for your journal entries.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you.

plugins.photosPermission: Indigo Habits needs access to your photos to add images to your journal entries.
plugins.cameraPermission: Indigo Habits needs access to your camera to take photos for your journal entries.

expo.description: Indigo Habits is a beautiful habit tracker and journal app that helps you build positive habits and reflect on your daily progress with affirmations, streaks, and mindful journaling.
